conclusion: Plan to analyze the image and apply electromagnetic induction principles.
The image shows a conductor rod labeled ab with a length of 4L, rotating at angular velocity ω around an axis through point O in a magnetic field B.
A potential difference is induced between the ends of the conductor when it moves through a magnetic field.
The magnitude of the induced potential difference U_ab is given by the equation U_ab = Blω.
Calculate potential difference as U_ab = B × 4L × ω.
The potential difference U_ab between end a and end b is 4BωL.
